title: Family Business
description: An explosion in a rice field in Colusa County, California kills the manager of a multi-million dollar farm. Police soon discover his death was no accident. Keith Morrison has chosen this episode as one of his most memorable classic episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
